mapper.select: select bid, ctid, cyear, clevel, cdesc, groupleader, groupname, RESULT_TYPE, WORK_NAME, preditfeedesc, predictfee, state,note from BILL where CTID= #{ctid} and CYEAR=#{cyear} and GROUPLEADER = #{groupleader}
mapper.insert: insert into BILL(bid, ctid, cyear, clevel, cdesc, groupleader, groupname, WORK_NAME, preditfeedesc, predictfee, state, attachfile,invitation) values (#{bid}, #{ctid}, #{cyear}, #{clevel}, #{cdesc}, #{groupleader}, #{groupname}, #{workName}, #{preditfeedesc}, #{predictfee}, #{state}, #{attachfile},#{invitation})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, temp.* FROM (SELECT B.BID, B.CTID, B.CYEAR, B.CLEVEL,B.CDESC, B.GROUPLEADER, B.GROUPNAME, B.RESULT_TYPE, B.WORK_NAME ,B.PREDITFEEDESC, B.PREDICTFEE,B.STATE,B.ATTACHFILE,B.NOTE,B.INVITATION,B.ACK_ACCOUNT ,C.CTID C_CTID,C.CTNAME,C.HOST_UNIT,C.COM_TYPE,C.RESULT_TYPE C_RESULT_TYPE,C.REFERENCE_PAPER ,S1.SNO S1_SNO,S1.SNAME S1_SNAME,S1.SSEX S1_SSEX,S1.SBIRTHDAY S1_SBIRTHDAY,S1.SDOMITORY S1_SDOMITORY ,S1.CNO S1_CNO,S1.SPWD S1_SPWD,S1.STEL S1_STEL,S1.STATE S1_STATE,S1.CARD_NUM S1_CARD_NUM from (select * from BILL where BID IN (SELECT BILL_ID FROM BILL_MEMBER WHERE BILL_TM_ID = #{SNO} ) ) B JOIN com_table C ON B.ctid=C.ctid join STUDENT S1 on B.GROUPLEADER = S1.SNO) temp ) WHERE rn>=#{LEFT} AND rn <=#{RIGHT}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, temp.* FROM (SELECT B.BID, B.CTID, B.CYEAR, B.CLEVEL,B.CDESC, B.GROUPLEADER, B.GROUPNAME, B.RESULT_TYPE, B.WORK_NAME ,B.PREDITFEEDESC, B.PREDICTFEE,B.STATE,B.ATTACHFILE,B.NOTE,B.INVITATION,B.ACK_ACCOUNT ,C.CTID C_CTID,C.CTNAME,C.HOST_UNIT,C.COM_TYPE,C.RESULT_TYPE C_RESULT_TYPE,C.REFERENCE_PAPER ,S1.SNO S1_SNO,S1.SNAME S1_SNAME,S1.SSEX S1_SSEX,S1.SBIRTHDAY S1_SBIRTHDAY,S1.SDOMITORY S1_SDOMITORY ,S1.CNO S1_CNO,S1.SPWD S1_SPWD,S1.STEL S1_STEL,S1.STATE S1_STATE,S1.CARD_NUM S1_CARD_NUM from (select * from BILL where BID IN (SELECT BILL_ID FROM BILL_MEMBER WHERE BILL_TM_ID = #{SNO} ) AND STATE=#{STATE} ) B JOIN com_table C ON B.ctid=C.ctid join STUDENT S1 on B.GROUPLEADER = S1.SNO) temp ) WHERE rn>=#{LEFT} AND rn <=#{RIGHT}

SELECT B.BID, B.CTID, B.CYEAR, B.CLEVEL,B.CDESC, B.GROUPLEADER, B.GROUPNAME, B.RESULT_TYPE, B.WORK_NAME ,B.PREDITFEEDESC, B.PREDICTFEE,B.STATE,B.ATTACHFILE,B.NOTE,B.INVITATION,B.ACK_ACCOUNT ,C.CTID C_CTID,C.CTNAME,C.HOST_UNIT,C.COM_TYPE,C.RESULT_TYPE C_RESULT_TYPE,C.REFERENCE_PAPER ,S2.SNO S2_SNO,S2.SNAME S2_SNAME,S2.SSEX S2_SSEX,S2.SBIRTHDAY S2_SBIRTHDAY,S2.SDOMITORY S2_SDOMITORY ,S2.CNO S2_CNO,S2.SPWD S2_SPWD,S2.STEL S2_STEL,S2.STATE S2_STATE,S2.CARD_NUM S2_CARD_NUM ,T.TNO T1_TNO,T.TNAME T1_TNAME,T.TSEX T1_TSEX,T.TBIRTHDAY T1_TBIRTHDAY,T.DNO T1_DNO ,T.TTEL T1_TTEL,T.TTITLE T1_TTITLE,T.TPWD T1_TPWD,T.TSTATE T1_TSTATE,T.CARD_NUM T1_CARD_NUM FROM (SELECT * FROM BILL_MEMBER WHERE BILL_ID=#{BID}) BM LEFT JOIN (SELECT*FROM BILL WHERE BID=#{BID}) B ON B.BID=BM.BILL_ID JOIN com_table C ON B.ctid=C.ctid LEFT JOIN STUDENT S2 on BM.BILL_TM_ID = S2.SNO LEFT JOIN TEACHER T ON BM.BILL_TM_ID=T.TNO
